name: GoldmedaliWorld
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light.”
”Alexa, set room fan to 3.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to the iWorld skill. This can enable you to configure you range of Goldmedal Home Automation devices with your voice. You can easily control your lights, fan speed, scenes, curtains using voice commands. 
Follow the below actions to turn on/off your light, change fan speed, modify light intensity, set AC Temperature and much more: 
1) Alexa, turn on bedroom light.
2) Alexa, set room fan to 3.
3) Alexa, set bedroom light to 50 percent. 
4) Alexa, brighten bedroom light.
5) Alexa, set bedroom light to green.

After connecting Alexa to your iWorld products in a few simple steps, you can enjoy your smart life:
1.Download “iWorld” App and register an account
2.Configure some devices on “iWorld” App
3.Download Amazon "Alexa" app and configure Echo with "Alexa" app
4.Search "Goldmedal iWorld" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category
5.Click Enable skill, and you will be navigated to login page
6.Input your “iWorld” App Account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page
7.Now all setup is finished.
